attributes.action: Stop CCG's in Worcestershire introducing a scoring system for hip operations.
attributes.additional_details: The CCG's plan to only treat the most severe cases where pain interferes with daily life.  The proposals have no clinical justification. Care is being rationed.
attributes.background: Cost-cutting plans to slash the number of people eligible for hip and knee replacements have been criticised by surgeons.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the clinical commissioning group.

You could raise your issue directly with the clinical commissioning group using the following website: http://www.worcestershire.nhs.uk/
